identifyBirdByPhotoDescription: Upload a clear photo of a bird, and our AI will do its best to identify the species. For best results, make sure the bird is the main subject of the image.
noPhotoSelectedToastDescription: Please choose a photo to identify.
identificationFailedToastDescription: An error occurred while trying to identify the bird. Please try again.
identifyBirdBySongDescription: Upload an audio recording of a bird's song. Our AI will analyze the sound patterns to identify the species. Clear recordings without background noise yield the best results.
noAudioFileSelectedToastDescription: Please choose an audio file to identify.
identificationFailedSongToastDescription: An error occurred while trying to identify the bird song. Please try again.
identifiedFromSongText: Identified from its song with a confidence of
manualIdentifierDescription: Can't get a photo or recording? No problem. Describe the bird you saw using the options below, and we'll search our database for possible matches.
selectBirdFeatures: Select the features of the bird you saw.
noBirdsMatch: No birds match your criteria. Try broadening your search.
shareEmailSubject: Check out this bird I found!
pleaseLogIn: Please log in to view your profile.
viewYourProfileInfo: View and manage your profile information.
pleaseLogInToViewHistory: Please log in to view your identification history.
noHistoryFound: You have no identification history yet. Go identify some birds!
identifyBirdByVideoDescription: Upload a short video of a bird. Our AI will analyze the footage to identify the species.
noVideoSelectedToastDescription: Please choose a video to identify.
